Refresh.description: Reload Page if supported by current tab

Add Category.description: Create a new category. Only works in the library

Delete Category.description: Delete the current category. Only works in the library

Find.description: Find a manga by name. Only works in the library and source page

Change Reader Mode.description: Change the current reader mode. Only works in the reader

Change Fit Direction.description: Change between fit to width or height. Only works in single page mode

Zoom Out.description: Zoom out of a page. Only works in the reader

Zoom In.description: Zoom in on a page. Only works in the reader

Previous Page.description: Go to the previous page. Proceeds to the previous chapter if you're on the first page. Only works in the reader

Next Page.description: Go to the next page. Proceeds to the next chapter if you're on the final page. Only works in the reader

Previous Chapter.description: Go to the previous chapter. Only works in the reader

Next Chapter.description: Go to the next chapter. Only works in the reader
